attributes.action: counsel the Speaker of the House of Commons to stand down with immediate effect, as a necessary step to cleanse Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As presiding officer, the Speaker must bear primary responsibility for the current disreputable condition of the House of Commons. He should go.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
